New Records: Christian Eriksen set a record for most appearances for Denmark with his 133rd international game
Key Match Events: Denmark secured a 0-0 draw against Serbia, securing a place in the knockout phase of Euro 2024
Both teams had goals disallowed, Denmark for a corner that went out of play and Serbia for offside
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark only needed a draw to move into the next phase
Serbia needed a victory to have a chance of making the knock-out stage of the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark players celebrate after clinching a spot in the European Championship knockout rounds
Serbia manager Dragan Stojkovic expressed disappointment and frustration with his team's performance
Denmark manager Kasper Schmeichel expressed confidence and excitement for the upcoming match against Germany
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark will play hosts Germany in the round of 16 in Dortmund on Saturday
Serbia finished with two points from two draws and came fourth in the group
Others: The Danes enjoyed substantial possession in the opening period against a Serbia side
Serbia mainly soaked up the pressure and looked to counter but rarely threatened
